Package org.timepedia.chronoscope.client.util.date

Class Summary
ChronoDate A specialized date class for use with the Chronoscope framework.
DateFields Simple structure that holds the constituent date fields that compose a complete date down to millisecond precision.
DateFieldSetter Facilitates setting of date fields via method chaining.
DateFormatHelper Utilities for formatting a ChronoDate into different date representations.
DateFormatterFactory  
DefaultChronoDate ChronoDate backed by a java.util.Date object.
EraCalc Encapsulates era-specific calculations.
FastChronoDate Date class that implements its own date and time calculations, and therefore does not rely on the Java (in hosted mode) or Javascript (in browser mode) Date class.
GregorianConstants  
GregorianEraCalc  
GWTDateFormatter Created by IntelliJ IDEA.
JulianEraCalc Handles date calculations up to but not including 1582-JAN-01 00h:00m:00s.0ms.
 

Enum Summary
DayOfWeek Represents the days of the week.
